response.summary:
All my life I've been passionate about technology, since I was a child I was opening all the electronics at home and trying to figure out how they worked. This made me quite a curious person and of course, I became an engineer.

I really enjoyed my time in university building circuits and coding programs, but I found something that particularly kept my attention when I came to France for an exchange program. I found out how much I like the systems that we use for processing signals and because of this I focused my profesional future in audio and image processing.

I always have to be learning something, that's why I got close to initiatives like edx.org and try to get as many certificates as possible. 

Even if I'm a science guy, I enjoy art (I think I have visited all the Parisian museums) and sports.
response.skills: OpenCV, C++, Git, Linux, Python (langage de programmation), Bash, Python, Linux Kernel, Vision par ordinateur, Traitement du signal, Simulations, Intégration, Électronique, Développement pour Android, Débogage, Script Shell, Test unitaire, Matlab, Java, MATLAB

company.name: LTU
company.description:
LTU, the French expert in computer vision AI, owns multiple 2D and 3D visual processing algorithms.   

Available in SaaS or On premise mode, the LTU solution ensures identification, comparison or detection in record time without having to resort to supervised learning of models based on Deep Learning. 

LTU has developed an innovative visual recognition solution that allows to quickly process an object or an image by assigning it a "unique signature", also called "Image ID". This patented technology offers significant performance in the computer vision market, as it overcomes the limitations of Deep Learning-based models when they are not adapted to the intended use. 

LTU offers the best image analysis technology to help private and public organizations exploit their data. LTU technologies serve various markets including defense/security, industry, space, publishing, culture and many others. 
Discover our technologies : 

-Visual Search: Suite of image processing functionalities to search, identify and organize your image and object databases (based on Matching, color search, OCR, clustering, classification)
- Change Detection: Automate comparison and the detection of differences between two media 

Watch our videos: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCFH--M5V44BovJty__FNPlw/videos

Website: www.ltutech.com
